description: Hard and soft landscape works (Conditon 4); details of the facing materials (Conditon 6); Construction Method Statement (Condition 7); details of any permanent external lighting (Condition 13); details of sustainable drainage (Condition 15); details of visibility splays (Condition 16); details to show a reduction in the width of the northern vehicular access (Condition 17); scheme for the reinstatement of any redundant vehicular crossover/s to the site (Condition 18); details of the refuse storage (Condition 22): Demolish existing dwellings. Erection of 3x3 bedroom dwellings and block containing 7x2 bedroom flats. (Summary)
decision_conditions: in accordance with plans Heavy Duty Aluminium Bollards (EDIFICE) Replaceable 20W LED Corn Bulb Recommended; ASD Horizon LED Outdoor Flush Light with Dusk to Dawn Sensor - Louvre; EO1 Rev P3 (Drainage Layout); Demolition and Construction Method Statement for 2-4 Oaks Lane Newbury Park, Ilford, IG2 7PL Date August 2013 v.2.0 AG; 98-100B (Proposed Landscaping Layout); Storm Sewer Design by the Modified Rational Method Tumu Consulting by Micro Drainage dated 22/01/2018 File 2018-01-22 SW Drainage; Cedral Lap Fibre cement weatherboard external cladding (C05 Grey); Smoked Yellow Multi Gilt Stock (Yellow Multi) 24320220 (Waresley); UPVC doors and windows (communal door LPS 1175 SR2 colour: Tarpaulin grey RAL 7010); (Bi fold doors PAS 24 where required, colour: Tarpaulin grey RAL 7010); (Casement windows PAS 24 where required colour: Tarpaulin grey RAL 7010) from Maple Windows Co Ltd, Unit 2 Eastgate Business Park, Argall Way, London, E10 7PG; Brick reveal illustration detail with 102mm set back from elevation for all door and window openings; Rear Bedroom doors only. (Ground, first and second floor only) UPVC French doors with fixed sidelights (RAL 7010); Privacy screen. 10mm satinised toughened glass 1.8m high reducing to 1.3m high; Railings Aluminium railings with painted finish 1.1m high Colour: Black; Power coated metal clad canopy with finish to match windows. Colour: Tarpaulin grey (RAL 7010); Hunter Plastics Squareflo plastic rainwater goods Colour: Black http://www.hunterplastics.co.uk; Redland concrete Plain Tile colour: Hedgerow Brown (Granular) Monier Redland Ltd Spectrum House;
